review.summary: Module initializer for the regions feature, providing router exports for database connection and region management functionality. This minimal __init__.py file follows Python best practices by explicitly defining public API through __all__ and importing necessary routers with clear naming.

positive_observations.observation: Clean and minimal module structure with explicit exports
Uses __all__ for controlled public API following Python best practices
Clear separation of concerns with separate routers for database and region management
Follows project convention of importing routers with descriptive alias names
No unnecessary imports or complex initialization logic
Proper module docstring describing the purpose

context.tests: No direct tests needed for this simple module initializer
context.configuration: No configuration required for this module initializer
